arm_group.description: 1. G-CSF: 10 μg/kg/day, administrated via SC injections from  Day 1 to Day 8; 2. TG-0054: 3.14 mg/kg, administrated via 15-min IV infusion from Day 5 to Day 9 as needed to reach the target collection goal

brief_summary.textblock:
This is a phase II study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of TG-0054 combined with G-CSF
      in mobilizing hematopoietic stem cells in patients with multiple myeloma, non-Hodgkin
      lymphoma or Hodgkin disease.

clinical_study.brief_title: PD and Safety of TG-0054 Combined With G-CSF in Multiple Myeloma, Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma and Hodgkin Disease Patients
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase II, Open-Label Study to Evaluate the Hematopoietic Stem Cell Mobilization of TG-0054 Combined With G-CSF in Patients With Multiple Myeloma, Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma or Hodgkin Disease

authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration
Taiwan: Food and Drug Administration, Minisitry of Health and Welfare

primary_outcome.description: Proportion of all patients who collected a total number of CD34+ cells over 5.0*10^6 cells/kg within first four leukapheresis sessions
primary_outcome.measure: the total number of hematopoietic stem cells (HSCs) collected within first four leukapheresis sessions following treatment

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.measure: the total number of HSCs collected within five leukapheresis sessions
the average number of leukapheresis sessions required to collect ≧ 2.5*10^6 CD34+ cells/kg and ≧ 5.0*10^6 CD34+ cells /kg

secondary_outcome.description: incidence and severity of AE and changes in safety parameters from baseline
secondary_outcome.measure: the safety following treatment with TG-0054 when combined with G-CSF

secondary_outcome.description: determine circulating CD34+ cell counts in peripheral blood
secondary_outcome.measure: the pharmacodynamics (PD) following treatment with TG-0054 when combined with G-CSF

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
